item.description:
Over the last year, this Meetup group has really taken off and become a wonderful treat for us. We'd like to celebrate the group's first anniversary by getting together for some outdoor games.

The last Meetup on the Common went beautifully, so hopefully we'll have a repeat. We're crossing our fingers for good weather.

Join us on Salem Common with all of your outdoor games. We'll be bringing badminton, bocce ball, and some two-player games. Hopefully we'll have some volunteers with horseshoes, croquet, etc. Also, feel free to bring blankets and chairs and something to drink.

Afterward, should you wish, we can go out to dinner to celebrate the one-year anniversary of the Salem Board Games Meetup. (While a little later than Aug. 19, our group and its members certainly deserve to be celebrated.)
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet near the Washington arch on the north-east side of the Common.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: An Anniversary Afternoon on the Common
